Directions: In a small bowl, combine orange juice and peel; set aside. In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Beat in water and vanilla. Combine flour and salt; gradually add to creamed mixture. Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts.
Roll into 1-in. balls. Place 1 in. apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 325 degrees F for 12-15 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove to wire racks to cool.
Strain reserved orange juice. Dip cookies in juice, then roll in additional sugar. Let dry. Store in an airtight container.
